form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Screened by NARA, 9/6/2023, Application for Permit to Re-enter: Alien Registration Receipt Card

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/6/2023 9. If you checked 1(b), fill in the items in this block. have (a) I continuously maintained the status of a treaty merchant since the date of my admission to the United States. have not (b) Briefly describe and show period of each business activity since date of admission: (c) Upon my return from abroad I intend to- resume my present business activities engage in a different business, as follows: 10. CHECK My Alien Registration Receipt Card is attached. A 14,579,720 ONE: Application Form I-90 for issuance of Alien Registration Receipt Card is attached. 11. The Permit to Re-enter, if issued, should be forwarded with my Alien Registration Receipt Card to: My address as shown in block #2 on reverse. 1221 Boston St., Los Angeles, California, 90026 Immigration and Naturalization Office at Other (Specify) 12. I do swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this application signed by me and that the statements herein are true and correct. (If application completed by other than applicant, that person must execute item 13.) NOTE.-This application may be sworn before an officer of the Immigration and Naturalization Service without payment of notarial fee Woon yee (Signature Wong of applicant) Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 20th day of December , A.D. 1967 at Los Angeles, California, U.S.A. HENRY LOWE Henry NOTARY PUBLIC (SEAL) My commission expices Commission Expires May 7, 1968 in and for the County of Los Angeles, State of California (Signature of officer administering oath) (Title) 13. SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM, IF OTHER THAN APPLICANT declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the applicant and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge. by Love (Signature) 903 North Broadway, Los Angeles, 90012 DEC 20 1967 (Address) (Date) APPLICANT-DO NOT WRITE BELOW THIS LINE Action on Application for Permit to Re-enter: Granted. Permit valid to / year 1/12/69 Action with regard to Alien Registration Recepit Card 1-151 submitted by Alien returned Single entry AR-103 or AR-3 submitted by Alien returned Multiple entries New I-151 issued on basis of I-90 Restriction on travel in following countries waived: Denied. Reason SIGNATURE OF IMMIGRATION OFFICER OFFICE LOS DATE 1/11/68 DELIVERY OF PERMIT INITIALS OF EMPLOYEE OFFICE DATE BY MAIL as above EFFECTING DELIVERY TO APPLICANT PERSONALLY has JAN 12 1968
